description:
The successor to the http://anidb.net/ch123015 [Beguir-Beu], developed by the http://anidb.net/ch132072 [Grassley company]. Five units are assigned to http://anidb.net/ch127929 [Sabina] and other pilots from http://anidb.net/ch125790 [Grassley House] for the duel with http://anidb.net/ch124445 [Miorine].
Source: Official page
name: CEK-077 Beguir-Pente
